Y=Yes, N=No

If you don't want to answer, you can just say "skip"

msg.spa:
Gracias por tu interés en el Design Insight Group!             
Desarrollamos tecnología para resolver problemas reales, como parte de la organización sin fines de lucro Blue Ridge Labs @ Robin Hood.

Estamos entrevistando padres trabajadores de bajos ingresos en Nueva York para obtener sus comentarios. Pagamos $25 por hora por participar (¡Es legal!, ¡Búscalo en Google! :)  Completa tu información básica y te llamaremos para terminar tu registro dentro de 3 días hábiles. (Esta es una encuesta automatizada. Llama o envía un mensaje de texto a una persona real: 860-365-2780)

Para empezar: ¿Cuál es tu nombre?
msg.base:
Thanks for your interest in the Design Insight Group! We build tech to solve real problems, as part of the nonprofit Blue Ridge Labs@Robin Hood.

We're interviewing low-income working parents in NYC to get your feedback. We pay $25/hr to participate (It’s legit— Google it! :) Fill out your basic info & we'll call to do an intake within 3 business days. (This is an automated survey. Call or text a real person: 347-699-6285)

To start: What's your first name?

msg.spa: Hola @extra.first_name, Parece que ya te registraste. Si esto es un error, envía un correo electrónico a blueridgelabs@robinhood.org
msg.base:
Hi @extra.first_name,
It looks like you've already signed up. If this is in error, please email blueridgelabs@robinhood.org

msg.base: Thanks for the info! We will reach out via phone within 3 business days. If you don’t hear back from us, you can text us at 347-699-6285 or email blueridgelabs@robinhood.org

notes.title: Initial Webhook:

notes.body: Question for Bill! Should we add parent question/tag, or do that over phone? I'm tempted to ask as a screen....something like: do you have a kid/kids under age 18?
notes.title: Hi Bill!

msg.base:
Hi @contact.first_name! 
KT here from Blue Ridge Labs. We build technology to make New Yorkers' lives better. We're currently looking for participants for upcoming projects. We offer $25/hr to participate in research conversations. 

Are you interested in this opportunity? Respond with Y for yes or N for no.
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Are you a parent? Please only answer 'Y' for yes or 'N' for no.

No problem. We'll reach out again with future opportunities. 

To learn more about our work, visit www.joinDIG.nyc

If you'd like to be permanently removed from our list, type 'remove' and we won't contact you again.
Great! We have a few questions to get started and see if you're a good fit for any current projects. This should take about 5 minutes to complete. First, are you a parent?
Sorry, I didn't understand. Please type Y if you are interested in participating or N for no.
Great! Are you a single parent?
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Type REMOVE and we will not contact you again.
Ok, got it! You have been successfully removed.
Ok, got it. Next question: are you currently a student in high school or college?
Sorry, I didn't understand your answer. Are you a single parent? Reply Y for yes or N for no.
Cool, thanks! Do you have a high school diploma or equivalent, like a GED?
Sorry, please answer again with either Y or N: are you currently in high school or college?

actions.subject: Failed deactivation tag on rapid pro flow

msg.base:
Sorry, please respond with either Y or N.

Do you have a highschool diploma, or equivalent, like a GED?

Thanks! We've received your responses and we'll be in touch soon if you are a good fit.

If you want to contact Blue Ridge Labs directly, you can text me (KT) at: 347-699-6285.
Ok. Next question: are you over the age of 61?
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that... Are you over the age of 61? Please respond Yes or No.
Great. Regardless of your living situation, do you have a spare bedroom at home?
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Do you have a spare bedroom at home? Please answer only yes or no
Thanks. Do you have kids under the age of 6?
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Do you have kids under the age of 6? Answer only yes or no.
Are your kids in ESL/English as a Second Language courses, or are you planning to enroll them when they are old enough?

Sorry, I didn't understand that. 

Are your kids in ESL/English as a Second Language courses, or are you planning to enroll them when they are old enough?


Yes or No please
Thanks. Next: do you live in a rent-stabilized or rent-controlled apartment?
I'm sorry, I couldn't understand your answer. Please respond w Y or N: do you live in a rent-stabilized or rent-controlled apartment?
Ok. Do you live in NYCHA housing? (if you don't know, respond 'N')
Sorry, I couldn't understand what you were trying to say. Do you live in NYCHA (public) housing? Y or N

notes.body:
Create a "webhook" and set it to "GET" to this url:

https://example.com/api/update_person?phone_number=@contact.tel_e164&tags=foobar,baz,bat                   

Add the header: Authorization with the value:
LrtGkKpD8E3srsMoXdX7aZ1z

after "&tags=" you can put as many tags as you want, comma delimited "_" is a space in a tag

1) your name 
2) your zip code

Your Last Name?

Is that correct?
Sorry, I didn't recognize that response. Is @extra.postal_code your zip code? Please answer Y or N.
Ok, what is your zip code?

msg.eng: What's your main source of water?
Thank you. Do you boil your drinking water? Please respond with yes or no
That's very good!
Thank you. To ensure your safety and the safety of your family please make sure you boil your water before drinking it.

notes.body: Here we only select the respondents who answered with either stream or well as source of water to move to the next step
notes.title: Split by water source

notes.body: Same logic here, but now we split by whether respondent is boiling water or not
notes.title: Split by yes/no for boiling water

notes.body: This message will only go out to respondents who both answered stream or well AND no for boiling
notes.title: combine two flow fields

notes.body: In this flow we ask 2 different questions and combining the 2 responses we can take a decision.
